lyrics.stanza: In death's waters I am buried, For with Christ my Savior, I have died; Now the world cannot pursue me, For its power here is nullified. I with Christ have risen too, Out of death with Him I walk and live; Now the Spirit life supplies And His strength exhaustless unto me doth give.
